attributes.action: Kick Scotland out of the United Kingdom for  lack of support to the Sovereign!
attributes.additional_details:
England and Wales will support the decision of what Scotland want! 
Unlike them, they don't have the support of the morjority of England and Wales to leave the EU so therefore we are not a 'United Kingdom' so let's be done and get rid!
Link bellow is of how a few small minded Scottish citizens treat their public service! Appalling!
https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=608290322678325&id=588918227948868
attributes.background: It has been brought to the British Citizens attention that Scotland are not happy that the rest of the United Kingdom voted to Leave the EU and are trying to now ruine England and Wales chances of escaping the EU by holding their own referendum.
